pre_sowing.context_prompt: Farmer is preparing to sow. Focus on soil conditions, planting window, seed subsidies.

sowing.context_prompt: Farmer is sowing. Focus on planting dates, seedling irrigation, insurance enrollment.

growing.context_prompt: Crop in active growth. Focus on irrigation, nutrient deficiency, weather stress, early pest signs.

pest_watch.context_prompt: Critical pest monitoring. Focus on disease ID, treatment, pesticide availability, humidity patterns.

harvest.context_prompt: Ready to harvest. Focus on dry weather windows, mandi prices, optimal harvest timing.

post_harvest.context_prompt: Crop harvested. Focus on selling price, transport cost, MSP claims, insurance claims.
